amendment.description: An amendment numbered 38 printed in Part D of House Report 118-216 to prohibit the use of funds to enforce the State Department's restrictions on executive branch officials regarding travel to Taiwan and normal communication with Taiwanese officials.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tiffany amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Tiffany amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Tiffany amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.
